extendedInfo.description: This is a simple Android application which detects other installed applications which appear to use known notification ad frameworks and offers the user the ability to easily uninstall them.If your device is running Android 4.1 "Jelly Bean" or higher, you don't need this app anymore! You can just press and hold on notifications and your device will tell you who is generating them.Currently detected frameworks include:- Airpush- LeadBolt- Appenda- IAC- Moolah Media- SendDroid- AppBucks- Kuguo- Applovin'THIS APP DOES NOT *BLOCK* THESE ADS. It only tells you which applications are causing them. You must uninstall the applications this app identifies to stop the ads.THERE IS NO OFFICIAL PAID OR "PRO" VERSION OF THIS APP. If you find an app with a similar name, description, and screenshots, odds are strong they have simply taken the source code and republished it as their own without any significant changes.If you experience crashes, using Android's "Report" feature is likely to get it fixed. Leaving comments without any useful information is not :)This app is open source - see the development page for full source code.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: Fall proof, fool proof and sucker proof. Best app ever. Small, simple, perfect.
reviews.author: Serge Kannon

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Brilliant as claimed. But since my phone no longer need this app so I just uninstalled it. Recommended. Read the description first.
reviews.author: Doppellganger Baudelaire

reviews.title: Sweet, Simple, And Effective
reviews.comment: Does what it says, nothing more, nothing less.  Its the only app I\'ve ever come across that was truely perfect. No bs, no ads, no complicated hoops to jump thru to operate.
reviews.author: Natalie pierce-shult

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: This is like the best app I\'ve ever seen in my whole life! It takes all those adds away and you need to download this! It take every single add away! THANK YOU SOOOO MUCH!!! :-)
reviews.author: Melanie Phillips

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I almost never leave comments on anything in my life but I thought this was one of the things that was truly worthy of praise. This app is amazing. Told me the cause of the irritating ads in seconds and I just deleted it. Plus its free!
reviews.author: Mina Melek

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I was being annoyed by these pop-up ads and unrequested notifications.   I could not figure out which app was causing them.  Downloaded this little gem and it found the source immediately.   The problem app was cleverly disguised and I thought it was a system app. Problem solved.   Thanks.  Could not recommend more!
reviews.author: Stephen S.

reviews.comment: Most amazing feature was that it managed to identify that my phone has this feature embedded and it suggested even how to use it, therefore not even needing this app. Hats down.
reviews.author: Gary Gelfand

reviews.comment: Kinda strange option when I pushed scan but after I pushed \"didn\'t work\" it scanned and exposed the culprit.  Thanks
reviews.author: Mike Casillas

reviews.title: Wow!!!    It was that simple!!?
reviews.comment: \302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260 DOWNLOAD!!! \302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260\302\260 It just shows you... a real developer embodies his platform. This is a true reflection of the love affair the developer has with android. Well done. Keep up the good work! :D
reviews.author: Martyn Pickles

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Instantly found the offending app that was causing pop up ads in my task bar. Don\'t know why the author recomends adon detector over his own app. I tried it and didn\'t like it. This on is better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: This app is absolutely perfect! Just what I needed to get rid of those annoying air push ads in my notification bar from apps I recently downloaded. Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Tanner Scorse

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very helpful and easy! Thanks a lot for the peace of mind!
reviews.author: Jared Hoover

reviews.title: Excellent App!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve put up with Everything from Notifications I did not subscribe to, to people wanting to just rip me off!! Your app eliminated all of them!! I\'d give you a greater than 5 star rating if I could!! THANK YOU!!
reviews.author: William Kingdon

reviews.title: TUMEKE!!
reviews.comment: Great app. got rid of constant crap adverts.  5 stars
reviews.author: Tom Allan

reviews.title: Brilliant app!!
reviews.comment: Was getting inundated with ads but this app identified those with push ads and enabled me to remove those responsible, within seconds. Would definitely recommend. Thank you :-)
reviews.author: claire vasey

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It does exactly what it says! No added crap, just finds apps that have these adds in them. I reinstalled just to rate this app, it even told me I didn\'t need it. Honesty is in such short supply nowadays it should be rewarded!

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Plain and simple, helped me get rid of notification bar ads. The app told me I actually didn\'t need to install it, since my phone can identify ad sources on its own.

reviews.title: Worked Perfect!
reviews.comment: Those stupid apps show on my phones home page all the time, and cluttered the screen. I remove them every day, but they always returned. I installed this free app and now they are gone permanently! Great app!

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Does what it says, very little size, simple. No negatives.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I kept having icons pop up on any empty space on my home screens and notification bar. It identified the app causing it, I deleted it. So far, no more problems. Works like it says it will :)
